Resource.Name: Account.LoginWithEmailCode.Tooltip
Resource.Value: Please enter your email address below. You will receive a link to login to your account without having to enter your password.

Resource.Name: Account.LoginWithEmailCode.EmailHasBeenSent
Resource.Value: Login email has been sent to you.

Resource.Name: Account.Login.WrongCredentials.CodeExpired
Resource.Value: The login link provided has expired or has already been used.

Resource.Name: Admin.Settings.Customer.LoginCodeMinutesToExpire
Resource.Value: Minutes to expire for email login
